Float will make all the elements below the one being floated react. So the article and the aside are floated left this allows them to line up with each other on the top and left sides. The footer has been cleared so it can sit at the bottom of the page.
This is what happens when you dont clear the footer
As you can see the footer has pulled up behind the other two elements and is acting strange, so it needs to be cleared to sit properly.
